Articles.Content: So, the Bulldog rover capsule clearly has two airlocks - one on each side. The on on the right (starboard) side works. If you EVA, you're coming out of this one. If you try to board on the oter one you can grab on (F), but boarding is not an option. I think this is a bug for this part and if there are two airlocks you should be able to use either one of them.
Maybe the door is just jammed on that side.   hehe.

20 hours ago, Steve7893 said:

Maybe the door is just jammed on that side.   hehe.

Probably is, I think these things are coming from Jeb's discount rover emporium. They look spiffy on the outside, but you know quality control is sometimes lacking.
